1.
Mba ho iray ny olona rehetra 
Mampifandray antsika namako 
Izay maniry sy mangetaheta 
Fitiana tena miainga avy ao am-po
Ka handeha/hihira ity hira ity 
Ho reharehako hatrany amparany 
Mandra-piavian’ilay tompo iray 
Ho avy handray ireo malalany
Isik’izao matoa re tafahaona
1.1:
1.1
Dia noho ilay fitiavan’i JESOA 
Nalatsa-drà ary koa nanafoana 
‘lay fitokiana hatramin’ny taloha
Koa ande hihira ity hira ity 
Hanandratra‘lay fasoavany 
Nampiray ahy sy anao ho tena iray 
Ho eo aminy,ho aminy amandrakizay
Fiadanana no indro atolony
Ho anao izay manaiky ho olony
F‘lay fahafatesana mamela mamy
No namonjy antsika zanany
